docs.summary: A store page for a specific product.
description: A store page for a specific product.

docs.summary: Gets the values of a product's [custom text fields](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-allowing-customers-to-add-a-message-when-purchasing-a-product).
description: The `getCustomText()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when the values of a product's custom text fields are
retrieved.

examples.title: Get the product's custom text field values

docs.summary: Gets all the information associated with the current product.
description: The `getProduct()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when all
of the information about the product shown on the `ProductPage` is
retrieved.

examples.title: Get the current product's information
body:
* "description": "

The best organic coffee that Colombia has to offer.

",

* "description": "

To preserve your beans' fresh roasted flavor as long as possible, store them in an opaque, air-tight container at room temperature.

\n"
*        "title": "What would you like us to print on the custom label?",
*            "content": "The best organic fair trade coffee that Colombia has to offer."

docs.summary: Gets the quantity of a product on the Product Page.
description: The `getQuantity()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when the product's quantity is retrieved.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - An object with `key:value` pairs representing the selected product option choices. Each pair is a product option created in the **Products** tab of the dashboard. Each key corresponds to an option name, and its values correspond to the choices for this option. For example, `{color: "white", size: "m"}`.

docs.summary: Gets the selected [product option](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options) choices of a product on the Product Page.
description: The `getQuantity()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when the selected product option choices are retrieved. Product option choices are returned as `key:value` pairs that are created in the **Products** tab of the dashboard. Each key corresponds to an option name, and its values correspond to the choices for this option. For example, `{color: "white", size: "m"}`.

examples.title: Get the selected product option choices

docs.summary: Gets the variant ID of the selected [product variant](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options#setting-different-prices-for-variants).
description: The `getSelectedVariantId()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when the selected product variant's ID is
retrieved.

examples.title: Get the selected product variant's ID
Get the selected product variant data by `variantID`

params.name: addToCartEventHandler
params.doc: The function to run when the **Add To Cart** button on the Product Page is clicked.

docs.summary: Adds an event handler that runs when the **Add To Cart** button on the Product Page is clicked.
description: The `onAddToCart()` function adds an event handler that runs when a site visitor clicks the **Add To Cart** button on the Product Page.
The event handler has 2 functions:
+ The `cancel()` function stops a site visitor from proceeding with the Wix Checkout process.
+ The `resume()` function allows a site visitor to proceed with the Wix Checkout process.

examples.title: Resume Wix Checkout process when Add To Cart button is clicked
Cancel Wix Checkout process when Add To Cart button is clicked

params.name: buyNowEventHandler
params.doc: The function to run when the **Buy Now** button on the Product Page is clicked.

docs.summary: Adds an event handler that runs when the **Buy Now** button on the Product Page is clicked.
description: The `onBuyNow()` function adds an event handler that runs when a site visitor clicks the **Buy Now** button on the Product Page.
The event handler has 2 functions:
+ The `cancel()` function stops a site visitor from proceeding with the Wix Checkout process.
+ The `resume()` function allows a site visitor to proceed with the Wix Checkout process.

examples.title: Resume Wix Checkout process when Buy Now button is clicked
Cancel Wix Checkout process when Buy Now button is clicked

params.name: choiceSelectedEventhandler
params.doc: The function to run when a product option choice is selected.

docs.summary: Adds an event handler that runs when a [product option](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-adding-and-customizing-product-options) choice is selected.
description: The `onChoiceSelected()` function adds an event handler that runs when a site visitor selects a product option choice such as {color: "white", size: "m"}.
The received `selectedChoices` object contains information about the product option choice that was selected.

examples.title: Get the product option choice that was selected

params.name: quantityChangedEventHandler
params.doc: The function to run when a product's quantity is changed.

docs.summary: Adds an event handler that runs when a product's quantity is changed.
description: The `onQuantityChanged()` function adds an event handler that runs when a product's quantity is changed.

params.name: label
params.doc: A string representing the **Add To Cart** button's new label.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the **Add To Cart** button's label is set.

docs.summary: Sets the **Add To Cart** button's label.
description: The `setAddToCartLabel()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when the **Add To Cart** button's label is set.

examples.title: Set the Add To Cart button's label

params.name: label
params.doc: A string representing the **Buy Now** button's new label.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the **Buy Now** button's label is set.

description: The `setBuyNowLabel()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when the **Buy Now** button's label is set.

examples.title: Set the Buy Now button's label

params.name: value
params.doc: A number representing a product's new quantity.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the product's quantity is set.

docs.summary: Sets the quantity of a product on the Product Page.
description: The `setQuantity()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when the product's quantity is set.

params.name: resume
params.doc: A function that resumes the Wix Checkout process. This function doesn't take any parameters.

params.name: cancel
params.doc: A function that cancels the Wix Checkout process. This function doesn't take any parameters.

docs.summary: Handles events triggered when the **Add To Cart** button on the Product Page is clicked.

params.name: resume
params.doc: A function that resumes the Wix Checkout process. This function doesn't take any parameters.

params.name: cancel
params.doc: A function that cancels the Wix Checkout process. This function doesn't take any parameters.

docs.summary: Handles events triggered when the **Buy Now** button on the Product Page is clicked.

params.name: selectedChoices
params.doc: An object with `key:value` pairs representing the selected product option choices. Each pair is a product option created in the **Products** tab of the dashboard. Each key corresponds to an option name, and its values correspond to the choices for this option. For example, `{color: "white", size: "m"}`.

docs.summary: Handles events triggred when a product option choice is selected.
Handles events triggred when a product's quantity is changed.
Current selling price range across all variants.

members.name: minValue
members.doc: Minimum price. Contains `amount` (string), `formattedAmount` (string), and `currency` (string).

members.name: maxValue
members.doc: Maximum price. Contains `amount` (string), `formattedAmount` (string), and `currency` (string).

docs.summary: List of all categories (direct and parent) containing this product.

members.name: items
members.doc: Array of all category items. Each has `id` (string) and `name` (string).

members.name: name
members.doc: Brand name.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Brand ID.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: Category ID.

members.name: categoryName
members.doc: Category name.

members.name: categorySlug
members.doc: Category slug.

members.name: breadcrumbs
members.doc: Breadcrumbs.

members.name: CHOICE_TEXT
members.doc: Text choice.

members.name: ONE_COLOR
members.doc: Single color choice.

members.name: choices
members.doc: List of available choices for the option.

docs.summary: Original price range (before discounts) across all variants.

members.name: minValue
members.doc: Minimum compare-at price. Contains `amount` (string), `formattedAmount` (string), and `currency` (string).

members.name: maxValue
members.doc: Maximum compare-at price. Contains `amount` (string), `formattedAmount` (string), and `currency` (string).

members.name: name
members.doc: Modifier title.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of a customization with `customizationType: "MODIFIER"`.

members.name: mandatory
members.doc: Whether customer input is required for this modifier.

members.name: modifierRenderType
members.doc: Modifier render type.

members.name: choicesSettings
members.doc: Choices settings.

members.name: freeTextSettings
members.doc: Free text modifier settings.

members.name: addedPrice
members.doc: Added price.

members.name: choiceId
members.doc: Choice ID.

members.name: choiceType
members.doc: Choice type.

members.name: key
members.doc: Modifier key. Used for eCommerce integration.

members.name: linkedMedia
members.doc: Product media.

members.name: name
members.doc: Choice name.

members.name: colorCode
members.doc: Color code in HEX format, [as described by MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/hex-color).

members.name: name
members.doc: Option name.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of a customization with `customizationType: "PRODUCT_OPTION"`.

members.name: optionRenderType
members.doc: Option render type.

members.name: choicesSettings
members.doc: Choices settings.

members.name: choiceId
members.doc: Choice ID.

members.name: choiceType
members.doc: Choice type.

members.name: inStock
members.doc:
Whether at least one variant with this choice is in stock in the default location of the store. 
 
 For example, a product with Color and Size options has these variants: [Blue, Small] which is out of stock and [Red, Large] which is in stock. 
 For choice Blue, this field is `false`. For choice Red, this field is `true`.

members.name: linkedMedia
members.doc:
Product media to display when this choice is selected. 
 
 When not empty, only these images are shown when a customer selects this choice. 
 Otherwise, all product images are shown. When multiple choices from different options are selected, 
 only media present in `linkedMedia` of ALL selected choices are shown. 
 For example, if `Color: Red` has images 1, 2, 3 and `Material: Silk` has images 2, 3, 5, 
 then only images 2 and 3 are shown when both are selected.

members.name: name
members.doc: Choice name. For text choices, this field also contains the choice value.

members.name: visible
members.doc:
Whether at least one variant with this choice is visible. 
 
 Default: `false`

members.name: colorCode
members.doc: Single color code in HEX format, [as described by MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/hex-color). For example, `#FF0000` for red.

docs.summary: Product cost range across all variants.

members.name: minValue
members.doc: Minimum cost. Contains `amount` (string) and `currency` (string).

members.name: maxValue
members.doc: Maximum cost. Contains `amount` (string) and `currency` (string).

docs.summary: List of categories that directly contain this product.

members.name: items
members.doc: Array of direct category items. Each has `id` (string), `name` (string), and `position` (number).

members.name: AMOUNT
members.doc: Discount by a specific amount.

members.name: PERCENT
members.doc: Discount by a percentage.

docs.summary: Custom extended fields for the product.

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields. 
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured. 
 
 You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions. 
 
 Learn more about [extended fields](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields).

members.name: SECURE_ARCHIVE
members.doc: Secure archive file.

members.name: SECURE_DOCUMENT
members.doc: Secure document file.

members.name: SECURE_MUSIC
members.doc: Secure music file.

members.name: SECURE_PICTURE
members.doc: Secure picture file.

members.name: SECURE_VIDEO
members.doc: Secure video file.

members.name: UNSPECIFIED
members.doc: Unspecified file type.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Monetary amount. For example, `"3.99"`, or `"-4.99"` for a negative amount.

members.name: formattedAmount
members.doc:
Formatted monetary amount. For example, `"$3.99"`. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"CURRENCY"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: defaultAddedPrice
members.doc: Default amount to be added to the product's price.

members.name: maxCharCount
members.doc: Maximum number of characters.

members.name: minCharCount
members.doc: Minimum number of characters.

members.name: title
members.doc: Title of the text to be input by the customer.

members.name: uniqueName
members.doc:
Info section unique name. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"INFO_SECTION"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Info section title. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"INFO_SECTION"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: description
members.doc:
Product description using rich content. 

 This field uses [Ricos document](https://dev.wix.com/docs/ricos/api-reference/ricos-document?apiView=SDK), a structured rich content data format. 
 For a quick start, visit the [playground](https://ricos.dev/), generate the content using the editor, and copy the resulting JSON object. 
 
 See the child properties of this field in the [Ricos Document reference](https://dev.wix.com/docs/ricos/api-reference/ricos-document).
 Learn more about [Rich Content](https://dev.wix.com/docs/sdk/articles/work-with-the-sdk/about-rich-content). 
 
 >**Notes:** 
 > + Returned only when you pass `"DESCRIPTION"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.
 > + This API enables the following [Ricos plugins](https://dev.wix.com/docs/ricos/getting-started/introduction#plugins): 
 > `indent`, `emoji`, `divider`, `codeBlock`, `file`, `gallery`, `giphy`, `image`, `table`, `link`, `textHighlight`, `textColor`

members.name: _id
members.doc: Info section ID.

members.name: plainDescription
members.doc:
Info section description in HTML. 
 
 When provided on create/update, this string must be a valid HTML. 
 It will then be converted to rich content. 
 `plainDescription` is ignored when value is also passed to the `description` field. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"INFO_SECTION_PLAIN_DESCRIPTION"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: availabilityStatus
members.doc: Current availability status.

members.name: preorderAvailability
members.doc: Preorder availability status.

members.name: preorderStatus
members.doc: Current preorder status.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Whether the variant is in stock.

members.name: optionId
members.doc: Whether preorder is enabled for the variant.

members.name: term
members.doc: Keyword value.

members.name: isMain
members.doc: Whether the keyword is the main focus keyword.

members.name: origin
members.doc: The source that added the keyword terms to the SEO settings.

docs.summary: Product media items. For a detailed explanation of product media, see [About Product Media](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/products-v3/about-product-media).

members.name: main
members.doc: Main media (image, video, etc.) associated with this product. Automatically set to the first item in the media list.

members.name: itemsInfo
members.doc:
All media items. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"MEDIA_ITEMS_INFO"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

docs.summary: An object representing a media item.
description: The `src` property of a `MediaItem` can be an image or video from the Media Manager.
The image source format is:
`wix:image://v1/<uri>/<filename>#originWidth=<width>&originHeight=<height>[&watermark=<watermark_manifest_string>]`
The video source format is:
`wix:video://v1/<video_uri>/<filename>#posterUri=<poster_uri>&posterWidth=<width>&posterHeight=<height>`

members.name: id
members.doc: Media item ID.

members.name: title
members.doc: Media item title.

members.name: description
members.doc: Media item description. Descriptions over 100 characters are truncated.

members.name: type
members.doc: Media item type. Can be "image" or "video."

members.name: src
members.doc: Media item source URL.

members.name: thumbnail
members.doc: Thumbnail URL for videos only.

members.name: items
members.doc:
All media items associated with this product. 
 
 The first item is automatically set as the product's main media.

members.name: IMAGE
members.doc: Image media type.

members.name: VIDEO
members.doc: Video media type.

members.name: choices
members.doc: List of modifier choices.

members.name: FREE_TEXT
members.doc: Free text.

members.name: SWATCH_CHOICES
members.doc: Swatch choices.

members.name: TEXT_CHOICES
members.doc: Text choices.

members.name: UNKNOWN_MODIFIER_RENDER_TYPE
members.doc: Not implemented.

members.name: optionChoiceIds
members.doc: Option and choice IDs. These match the IDs of the option and choice from the product's options field.

members.name: optionChoiceNames
members.doc:
Option and choice names. This needs to be used in all requests `OptionChoice` is needed, and all `OptionChoiceNames` fields are required. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"VARIANT_OPTION_CHOICE_NAMES"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: choiceId
members.doc: Choice ID.

members.name: optionId
members.doc:
Option ID. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"VARIANT_OPTION_CHOICE_NAMES"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: choiceName
members.doc: Choice name.

members.name: optionName
members.doc: Option name.

members.name: renderType
members.doc: Render type of the option. Required when using `optionChoiceNames`. Must match the `optionRenderType` of the referenced option.

members.name: deliveryProfileId
members.doc: Delivery profile ID.

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc: Fulfiller ID.

members.name: pricePerUnit
members.doc:
Price per unit settings. 
 
 >**Note:** Use this field only when relevant. For example, for products that are sold by weight, volume, or length.

members.name: pricePerUnitRange
members.doc: Product price per unit range. The minimum and maximum price per unit of all the variants.

members.name: shippingWeightRange
members.doc: Product shipping weight range - Calculated from the lightest and heaviest variant shipping weights.

members.name: weightMeasurementUnitInfo
members.doc:
Weight measurement unit. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"WEIGHT_MEASUREMENT_UNIT_INFO"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: actualPrice
members.doc: Variant's current selling price. Must be greater than or equal to 0.

members.name: compareAtPrice
members.doc:
Original price before any discount, shown with a strikethrough in the UI of Wix sites. 
 Only set this if a discount applies. When set, it should be higher than `actualPrice` to reflect savings.

members.name: description
members.doc:
Price per unit description. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"CURRENCY"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: settings
members.doc: Price per unit data for this variant. `measurementUnit` value must correspond to the measurement unit set on the product.

members.name: value
members.doc:
Calculated value of price per unit. Takes into account `pricePerUnit` settings of parent product, of this variant, and discounted price of variant. 
 For example if discounted price is 2$, product's price per unit setting is 1 Kg, variant price per unit setting is 0.5 Kg then this value is 4$ 
 (means variant weight is 0.5 Kg and it costs 2$ but we want to show price per 1 Kg so we show 4$).

members.name: maxValue
members.doc: Maximum price per unit across all variants.

members.name: minValue
members.doc: Minimum price per unit across all variants.

members.name: description
members.doc:
Price per unit info in the format of variant specific data / product setting, for example €4.00 / 1 Kg. 
 
 >**Note:** This field is returned by the API only when you pass `fields: "CURRENCY"` in a request.

members.name: value
members.doc:
Calculated value of price per unit. 
 Takes into account pricePerUnit settings of product and variants and price of variants. 
 For example if discounted price is 2$, product's price per unit setting is 1 Kg, 
 variant price per unit setting is 0.5 Kg then this value is 4$ 
 (means variant weight is 0.5 Kg and it costs 2$ but we want to show price per 1 Kg so we show 4$).

members.name: measurementUnit
members.doc: Measurement unit. For example, to define price per 100 grams, set this field to `"G"`.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Quantity. For example, to define price per 100 grams, set this field to `100`.

members.name: maxValue
members.doc: Maximum value.

members.name: minValue
members.doc: Minimum value.

docs.summary: An object representing a product in a store.

examples.title: Get the current product's information
body:
* "description": "

The best organic coffee that Colombia has to offer.

",

* "description": "

To preserve your beans' fresh roasted flavor as long as possible, store them in an opaque, air-tight container at room temperature.

\n"
*        "title": "What would you like us to print on the custom label?",
*            "content": "The best organic fair trade coffee that Colombia has to offer."

members.name: _id
members.doc: Product ID.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the product was last updated.

members.name: name
members.doc: Product name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Product description.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Main product media item (image or video thumbnail) URL.

members.name: mediaItems
members.doc: List of product media items.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Product stock keeping unit value. Must be unique.

members.name: ribbons
members.doc: Deprecated. Use `ribbon` instead.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Product currency.

members.name: price
members.doc:
Product price.
 The price must be greater than its discount.
 The product price is propagated to the product's newly-created variants. Product variants whose prices have been updated directly are not affected by the changes to the product price.

members.name: discountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product price.

members.name: formattedPrice
members.doc: Product price formatted with the currency.

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product price formatted with the currency.

members.name: inventoryItemId
members.doc: ID for the inventory item.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Product discount.

members.name: trackInventory
members.doc: Indicates whether inventory is tracked for the product.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Indicates whether the product is in stock.

members.name: quantityInStock
members.doc: Number of units currently in stock.

members.name: additionalInfoSections
members.doc: Additional product information sections.

members.name: productOptions
members.doc: All the available options for a store product.

members.name: productPageUrl
members.doc: Product page relative URL.

members.name: manageVariants
members.doc: Indicates whether product variants are managed. Can be set to true only if the product has options. Once set to true, `manageVariants` can only be reset to false only if no variants exist. Use [`getProductVariants()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-stores.html#getProductVariants) to check if variants exist. You cannot set `manageVariants` to true if more than 300 variants are defined.

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: List of product customization fields.

members.name: productType
members.doc: Product type. Either `"physical"` or `"digital"`. When creating a product using the API, currently only `"physical"` is supported.

members.name: slug
members.doc: Product slug.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Product weight.

members.name: variants
members.doc: Product variants.

members.name: pricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit.

members.name: formattedPricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: pricePerUnitData
members.doc: Details of the product's price per unit.

members.name: seoData
members.doc: Custom SEO data for the product. Learn more [about SEO](https://support.wix.com/en/search?term=seo).

members.name: ribbon
members.doc: Product ribbon. Used to highlight relevant information about a product. For example, `"Sale"`, `"New Arrival"`, `"Sold Out"`.

docs.summary: An object representing an additional info section for a store product.

members.name: title
members.doc: Section title.

members.name: description
members.doc: Section description.

docs.summary: List of all categories related to the product.

members.name: category
members.doc: A list of categories related to the product.

docs.summary: List of categories related to the product.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Category ID.

members.name: index
members.doc:
Index location of the product within the category, which can be utilized for sorting products in a specific category. 
For detailed instructions on how to set this up, refer to 
the [Add and arrange products in a category](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/products-v3/sample-use-cases-and-flows#add-and-arrange-products-in-a-category) sample flow.

docs.summary: An object representing a product variant's option choices.

members.name: optionKey
members.doc:
Value of the choice. This key name is dependent on the
 product option. For example, if a product has a size option, this
 key value will be something like `"Size"` and its value will be something like
 `"Large"`.

 `optionKey` is not case-sensitive. Therefore the values for the option keys "`Size`", "`SIZE`", and "`size`" are combined.

docs.summary: An object representing a custom text field for a store product.

members.name: title
members.doc: Product customization field title.

members.name: maxLength
members.doc: Maximum length of product customization field in characters.

docs.summary: An object representing a product discount.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Discount type. Required.

 One of:



 - `"AMOUNT"`
 - `"PERCENT"`
 - `"NONE"`

members.name: value
members.doc: Discount value. The discount value cannot be greater than the price of the product or the variant.

docs.summary: Main media (image, video, etc.) associated with this product. Automatically set to the first item in the media list.

members.name: altText
members.doc: Image alt text.

members.name: displayName
members.doc:
Media display name. 
 
 Overrides the default media name. Can be passed only when the media is set by a URL in this item's `url` field.

members.name: mediaType
members.doc: Media type.

members.name: thumbnail
members.doc:
Media thumbnail. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"THUMBNAIL"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: uploadId
members.doc: ID used to upload media to [Wix Media Manager](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-media-about-the-media-manager).

members.name: _id
members.doc: Set media by ID of an existing file in [Wix Media Manager](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-media-about-the-media-manager).

members.name: url
members.doc: Set media using an external media URL.

members.name: image
members.doc: Image details. Populated when you provide a [Wix Media Manager](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-media-about-the-media-manager) file ID in this item's `_id` field..

members.name: video
members.doc: Video details. Populated when you provide a [Wix Media Manager](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-media-about-the-media-manager) file ID in this item's `_id` field.

docs.summary: An object representing an option for a store product.

members.name: optionType
members.doc: Option type. Either `"color"` or `"drop_down"`.

members.name: name
members.doc: Option name.

members.name: choices
members.doc: Option choices.

members.name: SWATCH_CHOICES
members.doc: Swatch choices.

members.name: TEXT_CHOICES
members.doc: Text choices.

members.name: UNKNOWN_OPTION_RENDER_TYPE
members.doc: Not implemented.

docs.summary: An object representing all the available options for a store product, such as "Size" and "Color."
description: An option cannot be changed if it has choices and variants. To change an option, reset its variants with [`resetVariantData()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-stores-backend.html#resetVariantData). For each option, you can define a maximum of six choices.

members.name: optionKey
members.doc:
Name of the option. This key name
 is dependent on the options added to the product. For example, if a product has a size
 option, this key will be something like `"Size"`.

 `optionKey` is not case-sensitive. Therefore the values for the option keys "`Size`", "`SIZE`", and "`size`" are combined.

docs.summary: An object representing an option's choice for a store product, such as choice "Small" for the option "Size."
description: You can define between one and thirty choices for each option.

members.name: value
members.doc: Choice value.

members.name: description
members.doc: Choice description.

members.name: media
members.doc: Choice media.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Indicates whether the product with this choice is in stock.

members.name: visible
members.doc: Indicates whether the product with this option is visible.

docs.summary: An object representing the choice media.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Main choice media item (image or video thumbnail) URL.

members.name: mediaItems
members.doc: List of choice media items.

docs.summary: An object representing a ribbon for a store product.

members.name: text
members.doc: Ribbon text.

members.name: DIGITAL
members.doc: Digital product.

members.name: PHYSICAL
members.doc: Physical product.

members.name: UNKNOWN_PRODUCT_TYPE
members.doc: Not implemented.

docs.summary: An object representing a product in a store.

examples.title: Get the current product's information
body:
* "description": "

The best organic coffee that Colombia has to offer.

",

* "description": "

To preserve your beans' fresh roasted flavor as long as possible, store them in an opaque, air-tight container at room temperature.

\n"
*        "title": "What would you like us to print on the custom label?",
*            "content": "The best organic fair trade coffee that Colombia has to offer."

members.name: _id
members.doc: Product ID.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the product was last updated.

members.name: name
members.doc: Product name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Product description.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Main product media item (image or video thumbnail) URL.

members.name: mediaItems
members.doc: List of product media items.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Product stock keeping unit value. Must be unique.

members.name: ribbons
members.doc: Deprecated. Use `ribbon` instead.

members.name: ribbon
members.doc: Product ribbon. Used to highlight relevant information about a product. For example, `"Sale"`, `"New Arrival"`, `"Sold Out"`.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Product currency.

members.name: price
members.doc:
Product price.
 The price must be greater than its discount.
 The product price is propagated to the product's newly-created variants. Product variants whose prices have been updated directly are not affected by the changes to the product price.

members.name: discountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product price.

members.name: formattedPrice
members.doc: Product price formatted with the currency.

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product price formatted with the currency.

members.name: pricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit.

members.name: formattedPricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: pricePerUnitData
members.doc: Details of the product's price per unit.

members.name: inventoryItemId
members.doc: ID for the inventory item.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Product discount.

members.name: trackInventory
members.doc: Indicates whether inventory is tracked for the product.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Indicates whether the product is in stock.

members.name: quantityInStock
members.doc: Number of units currently in stock.

members.name: additionalInfoSections
members.doc: Additional product information sections.

members.name: productOptions
members.doc: All the available options for a store product.

members.name: productPageUrl
members.doc: Product page relative URL.

members.name: manageVariants
members.doc: Indicates whether product variants are managed. Can be set to true only if the product has options. Once set to true, `manageVariants` can only be reset to false only if no variants exist. Use [`getProductVariants()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-stores.html#getProductVariants) to check if variants exist. You cannot set `manageVariants` to true if more than 300 variants are defined.

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: List of product customization fields.

members.name: productType
members.doc: Product type. Either `"physical"` or `"digital"`. When creating a product using the API, currently only `"physical"` is supported.

members.name: slug
members.doc: Product slug.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Product weight.

members.name: variants
members.doc: Product variants.

members.name: seoData
members.doc: Custom SEO data for the product. Learn more [about SEO](https://support.wix.com/en/search?term=seo).

docs.summary: An object representing a product in a store.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the product was created.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Product ID.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the product was updated.

members.name: revision
members.doc:
Revision number, which increments by 1 each time the product is updated. 
 To prevent conflicting changes, the current revision must be passed when updating the product. 

 Ignored when creating a product.

members.name: name
members.doc: Product name. Translatable.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Product slug. 

 If not provided, the slug is autogenerated based on the product name.

members.name: url
members.doc:
URL to the site's product page. 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"URL"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: description
members.doc:
Product description using rich content. 

 This field uses [Ricos document](https://dev.wix.com/docs/ricos/api-reference/ricos-document?apiView=SDK), a structured rich content data format. 
 For a quick start, visit the [playground](https://ricos.dev/), generate the content using the editor, and copy the resulting JSON object. 
 
 See the child properties of this field in the [Ricos Document reference](https://dev.wix.com/docs/ricos/api-reference/ricos-document).
 Learn more about [Rich Content](https://dev.wix.com/docs/sdk/articles/work-with-the-sdk/about-rich-content). 
 
 >**Notes:** 
 > + Returned only when you pass `"DESCRIPTION"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.
 > + This API enables the following [Ricos plugins](https://dev.wix.com/docs/ricos/getting-started/introduction#plugins): 
 > `indent`, `emoji`, `divider`, `codeBlock`, `file`, `gallery`, `giphy`, `image`, `table`, `link`, `textHighlight`, `textColor`

members.name: plainDescription
members.doc:
Product description in HTML. 

 + When provided on create/update, this string must be valid HTML. It's then converted to rich content.
 + `plainDescription` is ignored when a value is also passed to the `description` field.

 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"PLAIN_DESCRIPTION"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: visible
members.doc:
Whether the product is visible to site visitors. 

 Default: `true`.

members.name: visibleInPos
members.doc:
Whether the product is visible in POS (point of sale). 

 Default: `true`.

 >**Note:** Always `false` for `productType: DIGITAL`.

members.name: media
members.doc: Product media items. For a detailed explanation of product media, see [About Product Media](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/products-v3/about-product-media).

members.name: seoData
members.doc: Product SEO data.

members.name: taxGroupId
members.doc: [Tax group ID](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/e-commerce/extensions/tax/tax-groups/introduction). Used to apply specific tax rates to products.

members.name: options
members.doc:
Product options, such as "Size" or "Color". Options define the ways a product can vary. 

 When you provide options, you must also provide the corresponding variants. Each variant must have exactly one choice for each option. For more information, see [About Product Options and Variants](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/products-v3/about-product-options-and-variants). 

 Options are stored as reusable [customization](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/customizations-v3/introduction) entities. Pass an existing customization's ID to reuse it, or define options inline and new customization entities are created automatically.

members.name: modifiers
members.doc:
Product modifiers. Collect additional information from customers without creating variants. 
 
 Unlike options, modifiers don't affect inventory or create additional variants. Use them for things like gift messages or engraving text. For more information, see [About Product Options and Variants](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/products-v3/about-product-options-and-variants). 
 
 Modifiers are stored as reusable [customization](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/customizations-v3/introduction) entities. Pass an existing customization's ID to reuse it, or define modifiers inline and new customization entities are created automatically.

members.name: brand
members.doc:
Product [brand](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/brands-v3/introduction). 
 + Pass `brand.name` to add a new brand while creating a product. 
 + Pass an existing brand's `_id` to assign that brand to the product.

members.name: infoSections
members.doc:
Product [info section](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/info-sections-v3/introduction). 
 
 + Pass `infoSection.uniqueName`, `infoSection.title`, and `infoSection.description` to add a new info section while creating a product. 
 + Pass an existing info section's `_id` or `uniqueName` to assign that info section to the product.

members.name: ribbon
members.doc:
Product [ribbon](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/ribbons-v3/introduction). 
 
 + Pass `ribbon.name` to add a new ribbon while creating a product. 
 + Pass an existing ribbon's `_id` or `name` to assign that ribbon to the product.

members.name: directCategoriesInfo
members.doc:
List of [categories](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-management/categories/introduction) that directly contain this product. 
 
 Updated automatically when a product is added/removed from a category, when an item is moved within a category, or when a category is deleted. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"DIRECT_CATEGORIES_INFO"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: allCategoriesInfo
members.doc:
List of [categories](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-management/categories/introduction) that directly contain this product, as well as their parent categories. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"ALL_CATEGORIES_INFO"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: mainCategoryId
members.doc: The ID of the product's primary direct [category](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-management/categories/introduction), which defines the product's breadcrumbs path. For example, if the product's main category is "T-Shirts" (which is a subcategory of "Clothing"), the breadcrumbs path is "Clothing > T-Shirts".

members.name: costRange
members.doc:
Product cost range - minimum and maximum costs of all product variants. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when the following conditions are met:
 > + You pass `"MERCHANT_DATA"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.
 > + Your app has the required `SCOPE.STORES.PRODUCT_READ_ADMIN` permission scope.

members.name: inventory
members.doc:
Product inventory info. 
 
 >**Note:** This field reflects the aggregated inventory status from the default location only. 
 > Use the [Inventory Items API](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/inventory-items-v3/introduction) to manage inventory for specific locations. 
 > Learn more about [inventory management](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/about-inventory-management).

members.name: productType
members.doc:
Product type: `PHYSICAL` for tangible goods that require shipping, or `DIGITAL` for downloadable content. 
 
 >**Note:** When passing `productType: PHYSICAL`, you must also pass `physicalProperties`. When passing `productType: DIGITAL`, you can optionally pass `digitalProperties` in each variant.

members.name: handle
members.doc:
A unique human-friendly identifier for the product. 
 
 Unlike the auto-generated `_id`, the handle can be set when creating a product. This is useful when re-importing products from other systems, as it provides a stable identifier across platforms. If not provided during creation, one is automatically generated. Can't be changed after creation.

members.name: currency
members.doc:
Currency used for the pricing of this product, in [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#list_of_ISO_4217_currency_codes) format. 
 
 Defaults to the currency defined in the site settings, unless specified in the request's `x-wix-currency` header. 

 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"CURRENCY"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: breadcrumbsInfo
members.doc:
Breadcrumbs of the `mainCategoryId`. Used to navigate to parent [categories](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-management/categories/introduction). 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"BREADCRUMBS_INFO"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: actualPriceRange
members.doc: Minimum and maximum current selling prices across all product variants.

members.name: compareAtPriceRange
members.doc: Minimum and maximum compare-at prices (original prices before discounts) across all product variants. Used to show savings to customers.

members.name: variantsInfo
members.doc:
Product variants. Each variant represents a specific purchasable version of a product defined by option choices. 
 
 Each variant must reference all product options via its `choices` array, using `optionChoiceNames` in requests. You must explicitly provide each variant when creating products with options. 
 
 For more information, see [About Product Options and Variants](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/about-product-options-and-variants).

members.name: extendedFields
members.doc:
Custom extended fields for the product object. 
 
 [Extended fields](https://dev.wix.com/docs/build-apps/develop-your-app/extensions/backend-extensions/schema-plugins/about-schema-plugin-extensions) 
 must be configured in the app dashboard before they can be accessed with API calls.

members.name: subscriptionDetails
members.doc:
Product subscriptions. 
 
 Subscription discounts are defined at the product level but apply to each variant's `actualPrice`. 
 This means the final subscription price varies per variant based on the variant's base price.

members.name: variantSummary
members.doc: Total number of variants for the product.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc:
Physical properties. 
 
 Required when `productType: PHYSICAL`.

members.name: cost
members.doc: Item cost.

members.name: profit
members.doc: Profit. Calculated by reducing `cost` from `discountedPrice`.

members.name: profitMargin
members.doc: Profit Margin. Calculated by dividing `profit` by `discountedPrice`. The result is rounded to 4 decimal places.

members.name: name
members.doc: Ribbon name.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Ribbon ID.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Media ID in media manager.

members.name: fileName
members.doc: Original file name.

members.name: fileSize
members.doc: Original file size.

members.name: fileType
members.doc: File type.

docs.summary: An object representing custom SEO data for the product.

members.name: tags
members.doc: SEO tag details.

members.name: settings
members.doc: SEO general settings.

members.name: tags
members.doc: SEO tag information.

docs.summary: An object representing the product's custom SEO tags.

members.name: type
members.doc:
SEO tag type.
Supported values:

 + `"title"`
 + `"meta"`
 + `"script"`
 + `"link"`

members.name: props
members.doc:
The props property holds an object of `{"key": "value"}` pairs where the key is one of the SEO tag's properties (name, content, rel, href, etc.)
and the value is the value for that property. `{"name": "description", "content": "The description itself."}`.

members.name: meta
members.doc: Tag metadata. For example, `{"height": 300, "width": 240}`.

members.name: children
members.doc: Tag inner content. For example, `<title> inner content </title>`.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether the tag is a custom tag.

members.name: disabled
members.doc: Whether the tag is disabled.

members.name: preventAutoRedirect
members.doc:
Whether the [automatic redirect visits](https://support.wix.com/en/article/customizing-your-pages-seo-settings-in-the-seo-panel) from the old URL to the new one is enabled. 
 
 Default: `false` (automatic redirect is enabled)

members.name: keywords
members.doc: User-selected keyword terms for a specific page.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Subscription ID.

members.name: description
members.doc: Subscription description.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount info (optional). For example, a $20 discount would be `amount: 20`, `type: AMOUNT`.

members.name: frequency
members.doc:
Frequency of recurring payment. 
 For example, if `frequency: MONTH` and `billingCycles: 6`; payment will be made monthly for 6 months.

members.name: interval
members.doc:
Interval of recurring payment. 
 For example, if `frequency: MONTH`, `billingCycles: 3` and `interval: 2`; payment will be made every 2 months for a total of 6 months. 
 
 Default: `1`

members.name: title
members.doc: Subscription title.

members.name: visible
members.doc:
Whether the subscription is visible to site visitors. 
 
 Defailt: `true`

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period. Can't be `false`, instead set `billingCycles`.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends.

members.name: allowOneTimePurchases
members.doc:
Whether to allow one-time purchases in addition to subscription-based purchases. 
 
 Default: `false`

members.name: subscriptions
members.doc: Subscriptions.

members.name: type
members.doc: Discount type.

members.name: amountOff
members.doc: Amount to discount from the variant `discountedPrice`.

members.name: percentOff
members.doc: Percentage to discount from variant `discountedPrice`.

members.name: price
members.doc: Subscription price calculated by applying subscription discount to the variant `price.actualPrice`.

members.name: pricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit info.

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc: Subscription ID.

members.name: description
members.doc:
Price per unit description. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"CURRENCY"` to the `fields` array in Products API requests.

members.name: value
members.doc: Calculated value of price per unit. Takes into account `pricePerUnit` settings of parent product, `pricePerUnit` settings of this variant, and the variant subscription price..

members.name: subscriptionPrices
members.doc: Subscription prices.

members.name: type
members.doc:
SEO tag type. 
 
 Supported values: `"title"`, `"meta"`, `"script"`, `"link"`.

members.name: props
members.doc: A `{"key": "value"}` pair object where each SEO tag property ("name", "content", "rel", "href") contains a value. For example, `{"name": "description", "content": "The description itself."}`.

members.name: meta
members.doc: SEO tag metadata. For example, `{"height": 300, "width": 240}`.

members.name: children
members.doc: SEO tag inner content. For example, `<title> inner content </title>`.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether the tag is a [custom tag](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-additional-meta-tags-to-your-sites-pages).

members.name: disabled
members.doc: Whether the tag is disabled. If the tag is disabled, people can't find your page when searching for this phrase in search engines.

members.name: url
members.doc: Thumbnail url.

members.name: height
members.doc: Thumbnail height.

members.name: width
members.doc: Thumbnail width.

members.name: altText
members.doc: Thumbnail alt text.

docs.summary: URL to the site's product page.

members.name: relativePath
members.doc: The relative path for the page within the site. For example, `/product-page/a-product`.

members.name: url
members.doc: The page's full URL. For example, `https://mysite.com/product-page/a-product`.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Variant ID.

members.name: barcode
members.doc: Variant barcode.

members.name: choices
members.doc:
List of choices that define this variant. Each variant must have exactly one choice for each product option. 
 
 Use `optionChoiceNames` in all requests where this field is required. For products without options, this array is empty, representing a single "default variant". 
 
 For more information, see [About Product Options and Variants](https://dev.wix.com/docs/api-reference/business-solutions/stores/catalog-v3/about-product-options-and-variants).

members.name: inventoryStatus
members.doc: Variant inventory status.

members.name: media
members.doc: Variant media.

members.name: price
members.doc: Variant price.

members.name: revenueDetails
members.doc:
Variant revenue details. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when the following conditions are met:
 > + You pass `"MERCHANT_DATA"` to the `fields` array in a Products API request.
 > + Your app has the required `SCOPE.STORES.PRODUCT_READ_ADMIN` permission scope.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Variant SKU (stock keeping unit).

members.name: subscriptionPricesInfo
members.doc:
Subscription prices calculate by applying subscription discount to the variant `price.actualPrice`. 
 
 >**Note:** Returned only when you pass `"SUBSCRIPTION_PRICES_INFO"` to the `fields` array in a Products API request.

members.name: visible
members.doc:
Whether the variant is visible to site visitors. 
 
 Default: `true`

members.name: digitalProperties
members.doc: Digital properties. Must be passed when `productType: DIGITAL`.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties. Must be passed when `productType: PHYSICAL`.

members.name: digitalFile
members.doc:
Digital file which will be downloaded by the buyer after successful purchase. 
 Each variant can have a different digital file, allowing you to offer different content per variant.

docs.summary: An object representing variant information to use when creating or updating variants.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Variant currency.

members.name: price
members.doc: Variant price. The variant price must be greater than its discount. If the variant price has been updated, changes to the product price do not affect the variant price.

members.name: discountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted variant price.

members.name: formattedPrice
members.doc: Variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Variant weight.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Variant stock keeping unit value.

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the variant is visible in the store.

members.name: pricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit.

members.name: formattedPricePerUnit
members.doc: Price per unit formatted with currency symbol.

docs.summary: An object representing a product variant item.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Unique variant ID.

members.name: choices
members.doc: The choices of the retrieved variant.

members.name: variant
members.doc: Variant information.

members.name: pricePerUnit
members.doc:
Price per unit info, in order to show price per unit on the product page. 
 For example if one sells cheese and defines 100g here then we know that buying this variant buyer receives 100g of cheese. 
 But on product page price will be displayed for units defined on product level. See `pricePerUnit.value` to understand how it's calculated.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Variant shipping weight. `product.physicalProperties.shippingWeightRange` values are taken from here.

docs.summary: Total number of product variants for the product.

members.name: variantCount
members.doc: Total number of variants for the product.

members.name: variants
members.doc: List of related variants.

members.name: weightMeasurementUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit.

members.name: maxValue
members.doc: Maximum weight across all variants associated with this product.

members.name: minValue
members.doc: Minimum weight across all variants associated with this product.

members.name: KG
members.doc: Kilograms.

members.name: LB
members.doc: Pounds.

members.name: UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT
members.doc: Weight unit can't be classified due to an error.

docs.summary: An object representing a product's price per unit data.

members.name: totalQuantity
members.doc: Product’s total weight, volume, or area. For example, if your product weighs 1 kilogram, the `totalQuantity` is `1`.

members.name: totalMeasurementUnit
members.doc:
Total measurement unit of weight, volume, or area. For example, if your product weighs 1 kilogram, the `totalMeasurementUnit` is `"KG"`.

Supported values:
`"ML"`, `"CL"`, `"L"`, `"CBM"`, `"MG"`, `"G"`, `"KG"`, `"MM"`, `"CM"`, `"M"`, `"SQM"`, `"OZ"`, `"LB"`, `"FLOZ"`, `"PT"`, `"QT"`, `"GAL"`, `"IN"`, `"FT"`, `"YD"`, `"SQFT"`.

members.name: baseQuantity
members.doc: Product’s base weight, volume, or area. For example, for a product weighing 1 kilogram, the `baseQuantity` could be `100` (grams).

members.name: baseMeasurementUnit
members.doc:
Base measurement unit of weight, volume, or area. For example, if your product weighs 1 kilogram, and the `baseQuantity` is `100` grams, `baseMeasurementUnit` is `"G"`.

Supported values:
`"ML"`, `"CL"`, `"L"`, `"CBM"`, `"MG"`, `"G"`, `"KG"`, `"MM"`, `"CM"`, `"M"`, `"SQM"`, `"OZ"`, `"LB"`, `"FLOZ"`, `"PT"`, `"QT"`, `"GAL"`, `"IN"`, `"FT"`, `"YD"`, `"SQFT"`.
